about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Giraffe Clicker – an addictive clicker game where every click brings you closer to a new giraffe! Tap the screen, earn points, and collect rare and unique giraffes, each with its own special traits and abilities.

Every certain number of clicks, you'll receive a new giraffe in your inventory with random style. Compete with friends to gather the largest giraffe collection and unlock new species!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Giraffe Clicker – an addictive clicker game where every click brings you closer to a new giraffe! Tap the screen, earn points, and collect rare and unique giraffes, each with its own special traits and abilities.

Every certain number of clicks, you'll receive a new giraffe in your inventory with random style. Compete with friends to gather the largest giraffe collection and unlock new species!
name: Giraffe

  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
